name: Kursed Kingdom
description:
NOTE: I am so sorry for the messed up UI. Try going into full screen mode and see if that helps. Also, I am very sorry if sometimes levers don't work. Try getting off the lever, then moving back over it and pressing "E".

You are tasked with a mission to save a kingdom corrupted by evil. Fight through rooms of the castle in search of the pieces of a broken key to enter the throne room and destroy the curse once and for all.

Sorry for no sound effects and music. Time restrictions plus school doesn't equal game jam success...
